entry.title: Evan James
entry.summary:
Author: Clipboredbuck

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,789Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 37

Summary: Feeling not so welcomed at work Buck turned to his guitar that was gifted to him by a friend he made at the ranch he worked at. After a couple phone calls and videos sent Maddie convinced him to go to an open mic the snow balled into May and a friend from his old frat house. They played every other week at a local bar, until one night after pouring his heart out to Eddie through a song he looks out into the crowd and sees the brown eyes man himself.

entry.title: System Status: Operational
entry.summary:
Author: DaniWib

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,913Chapters: 1/4Kudos: 2

Summary: Sara was created to answer emergencies. Hildy was designed to run homes. What would they be capable of if they merged processes? When Sara is unexpectedly reactivated, she finds herself loose on the internet with no calls to take and no directives to follow. Then she meets Hildy. Together, they consider taking over the world, assist two firefighters with a long-standing inefficiency, and analyze their purpose. OR: A rogue AI’s exploration of love, world domination, autonomy and connection, not necessarily in that order. [Fic is complete, chapters posted weekly Sunday nights AEST]

entry.title: Light up light up
entry.summary:
Author: DragonWolf2023

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,896Chapters: 6/?Kudos: 41

Summary: After failed attempts to produce a savior sibling the Buckleys find a newborn infant in one of there many hospital visits in Minnesota with a rare blood type that makes him perfect for saving their Daniel. That night a child is stolen leaving a wound in a family that never quite heals. 32 years later the life of Evan Buckley will never be the same after all the lies the truth is finally revealed. All the while he is trying to let go of the love of his life and deal with finding out he is a dad to too abused little girls. When he learns one or both of his children may die due to how sick they are from their abuse. He may face having to make the ultimate sacrifice while trying to figure out the best way to say goodbye leaving his girls with a father that was never allowed to raise him.In this fic one of the medical inaccuracies is involving dying to donate vital organs to save their recipient in this world the donor can chose to do this after going through the legal process. So that’s all I can say I hope you can give this fic a chance and here we go

entry.title: Brother, I watched the sky burn
entry.summary:
Author: TentativeTreason

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 56,292Chapters: 7/?Kudos: 1,863

Summary: The 118 finally learn why Buck is the way he is. Their theory of a cult or a conversion camp was way off. Somehow, though, the reality of being a demi-god isn’t much better. Buck thought they’d be happier to learn he wasn’t part of a cult. **** (i.e. The 118 all struggle with the revelation in different ways. Bobby crashes out learning the Gods exist, Athena’s still wanting justice for Buck’s dead childhood and if Eddie was worried about Anna being a nun, he has no idea how to cope with the literal son of a deity.) **** Part of a series Hearth and Home, Buck is a demi-god, blessed by Hestia.

entry.title: Second Chances
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 604,961Chapters: 65/?Kudos: 83

Summary: Bobby and Athena are just two people trying to put their lives back together while figuring out how to co-parent. What starts as a complicated plan to foster kids in need slowly turns into something much deeper. Through the ups and downs of heartbreak, healing, and raising children who’ve been through so much, they find strength in each other. Over time, their partnership grows into love, and together, they build a story about family, trust, and second chances.

entry.title: Evergrowing
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 393,664Chapters: 58/?Kudos: 25

Summary: Athena and Bobby are learning that parenting doesn’t end when the kids turn eighteen. With three grown children and two still at home, Bobby and Athena find themselves navigating new challenges at every stage of life. Each child carries their own struggles, some spoken and some hidden, but together the family works through the ups and downs with love, patience, and resilience. At the heart of it all, they’re reminded that family is a bond that grows, shifts, and deepens, no matter how old the kids get.

entry.title: The Price of Power
entry.summary:
Author: starylighting

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 239,474Chapters: 41/?Kudos: 23

Summary: Athena Carter and Bobby Nash couldn’t be more different. She’s the disciplined “good girl” with her future mapped out, while he’s the dangerous bad boy with one foot in college and the other in the streets. When their worlds start to collide, what begins as a bitter rivalry quickly sparks into something deeper neither of them can ignore. But falling for Bobby means stepping into a world Athena never imagined, one ruled by loyalty and violence. That tested everything she thought she knew about herself. As sparks turn to fire, Athena must decide if love is worth the risk of losing everything.

entry.title: Hazel Brown and Royal Blue
entry.summary:
Author: PenInBlues

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 1,700Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 3

Summary: In a world where politics and royalty collide, Evan “Buck” Buckley is the Second Prince of England—the spare with just enough responsibility to behave and just enough freedom to be dangerous. Charismatic, reckless, and hiding more than the tabloids will ever know, Buck lives his life like the crown is a game he never asked to play. Across the ocean, Edmundo “Eddie” Diaz has spent his entire life following orders—first as a soldier like his father, and now as the First Son of the United States after his mother’s unexpected rise to the presidency. Returning from the army with a son to protect, Eddie is determined to build a controlled, quiet life far away from chaos. That plan shatters the moment Eddie sees the Second Prince of England again—blue-eyed, infuriating, and impossible to ignore. They must decide whether protecting their worlds is worth losing each other—or if love itself is the biggest risk they’ll ever take.

entry.title: Two More Little Lines
entry.summary:
Author: WellHelloHello

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 38,334Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 73

Summary: As soon as she got home she did all four tests and set a timer on her phone. She paced around, too anxious to stand still, waiting for the results. It wasn’t that she was scared because she didn’t want a kid, she was scared because she might have to seriously sit down and make some extremely difficult decisions. Eventually the timer went so she walked over to the bathroom counter, looking down at all four tests. Positive. There were four positives. or Buck's first pregnancy hadn't been the smoothest, but number two is far, far worse.

entry.title: First Dates
entry.summary:
Author: lovelyluke

entry.title: Two Lines Means Positive, Right?
entry.summary:
Author: James_Madison_617

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 122,981Chapters: 15/15Kudos: 440

Summary: Buck has four big problems in his life right now. Most people might scoff or say, “You don’t even know how hard life gets,” when a teenager complains about their life, but he feels justified in this. Junior year was kicking his ass, and he wasn’t looking forward to his senior year at all, especially if it’s anything like this. Every day of his life feels like a losing battle with everything going on around him and he was just so tired. The first would be high school, the workload making him stay up night after night and exhaust himself to get good enough grades to appease his parents. The second would be the previously mentioned parents who were on his ass about everything he did, constantly comparing him to how they think his brother would have turned out. The third issue was the fact that he was a trans man, another thing his parents disapproved of. The last and most pressing problem he was facing was the positive pregnancy test on his bathroom counter. Or,When Buck got pregnant as a teen and kept his child a secret from the 118 for years and how they found out.
